title: Shahid Hasan
aboutGreeting:
Hi, I’m Shahid Hasan, a software engineer and independent security researcher. In university, I solved complex problems through competitive programming, winning top rankings in ICPC regional and inter-university contests, and honed strong analytical and algorithmic skills.

After graduation, I joined an AI SaaS startup, building systems to generate thousands of Amazon reviews, biographies, and info articles, helping users automate content creation efficiently. Currently, I work at a real-time ad tech company, developing pipelines and backend systems for data-driven advertising campaigns.

Alongside work, I actively research cybersecurity, exploring vulnerabilities, system protections, and security techniques to strengthen applications and infrastructure.
education: B.Sc. in Computer Science and Engineering
skills: Languages: C++, Python, Go, JavaScript, TypeScript
Frameworks: React, Vue, Node.js, Express.js, FastAPI
